entry.title: Armenia not in arms race with any country, defense chief says

media:group.media:title: Armenia not in arms race with any country, defense chief says
media:group.media:description:

ีึีฅึีฝ ีีกีทีซีถีฃีฟีธีถีธึีด ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีพีกีฎ ีีกีต-ีกีดีฅึีซีฏีตีกีถ ีผีกีฆีดีกีพีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏีกีถีธีถีกีคึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฃีฌีญีกีพีธึ ีฏีฅีฟีจ, ีฉีฅึึีฝ, ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีถีธึ ีกีฟีธีดีกีฏีกีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีผีกีถีฏีกึีถ ีง, ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง ยซิฑีฌีซึ ีดีฅีคีซีกยป-ีซ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคีซึ ิฑึีฝีฅีถ ิฝีกีผีกีฟีตีกีถีจึ ีีก ีถีทีธึีด ีงี ีกีตีฝ ีฐีกึึีธึีด ีฐีฝีฟีกีฏ ีฏีธีถีฝีฅีถีฝีธึีฝ ีฏีก ิฒีกีตีคีฅีถีซ ีธึ ินึีกีดึีซ ีฉีซีดีฅึีซ ีดีซีปึึ ิฝีกีผีกีฟีตีกีถีซ ีฐีกีดีธีฆีดีกีดีขี ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีพีกีฎ ึีกีฝีฟีกีฉีธึีฒีฉีจ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีซ ีฌีกีตีถ ีคีกีทีฟ ีง ีขีกึีธึีด. ีคึีก ีฟีกีฏ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฌีซีถีซ ึีกีฝีฟีกีฉีฒีฉีกีตีซีถ ีดีฅีฎ ีขีกีฆีกึ ิฝีกึีฟีซีกีตีซ ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีดีกีดีข ีีกีทีซีถีฃีฟีธีถีจ ีถีกึ ีธึีฒีฅึีฑ ีง ีฐีฒีธึีด ีดีซ ีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏีกีฐีกีฟีพีกีฎีธึีด, ีฅึีข ีึีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีผีกีฆีดีกีพีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีคีกีคีกึีฅึีพีฅีฌ ีงึ

media:group.media:title: ีีกึีฏีกีตีซีถ ีถีธึ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีถ ีธึ ีคึีกีถึ ีกีฆีคีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซ ีพึีก. ีีฅึีฃีฅีต ีีธึึีกีคีตีกีถ
media:group.media:description:
ยซีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซยป ีฟีกีฒีกีพีกึีธึีด ิฑิบ ึีธีญีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐีซ ีญีธึีฐึีคีกีฏีกีถ ีีฅึีฃีฅีต ีีธึึีกีคีตีกีถีจ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีด ีง 2025 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซึ ีธึีชีซ ีดีฅีป ีดีฟีถีธีฒ ีฐีกึีฏีกีตีซีถ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจึ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีกีถีคึีกีคีกึีฑ ีง ีฏีกีฟีกึีพีธึีด 2024-ีซ ีบีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีขีตีธึีปีฅีซ 220 ีดีซีฌีซีกึีค ีคึีกีดีซ ีฉีฅึีฐีกีพีกึีกีฃึีดีกีถ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีถีฅึีซีถ ึ ีถีธึ ีฐีกึีฏีกีตีซีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีฆีคีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ ึีธึึ ีธึ ีดีซีปีซีถ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซ ีพึีกึ ีีกีฟีธึีฏ ีธึีทีกีคึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีง ีคีกึีฑีพีธึีด ีทึีปีกีถีกีผีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกึีฏีซ ีคึีธึีตึีกีนีกึีฅึีซ ีขีกึีฑึีกึีดีกีถีจ ึ ิฑิฑี-ีซ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีซ ีถีธึ ีฏีกีถีธีถีถีฅึีซีถึ ีีถีถีกึีฏีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีถีกึ ีฟีฅีญีถีธีฌีธีฃีซีกีฏีกีถ ึ ีฃีตีธึีฒีกีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีถีกีญีกีฟีฅีฝีพีกีฎ ีถีธึ ีฐีกึีฏีกีตีซีถ ีกึีฟีธีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ, ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีถีกึ ีธึีทีกึีพีกีฎ ีฐีกึีฏีฅึีซ ีฟีธึีตีชีฅึีซ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีจ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีกีนีกึีฅึีซีถึ

media:group.media:title: ิฒีกึีพีธึีด ีดีฅีฏีถีกึีฏีธึีด ีง ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีผีกีฆีดีกึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึีถีฅึีซ ยซีคีกีฟีจยป. ีซีีถีน ีฝีบีกีฝีฅีฌ
media:group.media:description:
ิฒีกึีพีธึีด ีฐีธึีถีพีกึีซ 17-ีซีถ ีฏีฏีกีตีกีถีก ีกีบึ ึีซีถีซ ีฏีกีฌีกีถึีซ ีฟีกีฏ ีฃีฟีถีพีธีฒี ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีผีกีฆีดีกึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึีถีฅึีซ ีฃีธึีฎีธีพ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีคีกีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีถีซีฝีฟีจึ 2023-ีซ ีฝีฅีบีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซีถี ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีขีผีถีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีดีกีถ ึ ึีฅึีซีถ, ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีจ ีฑีฅึีขีกีฏีกีฌีฅีฌ ีงึ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีผีกีฆีดีกึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีธึีฉ ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีธึึีนีซ ีธึ ีถึีกีถึ ีฏีฅีฒีฎ ีดีฅีฒีกีคึีกีถึีถีฅึ ีกีผีกีปีกีคึีฅีฌึ ิปีีถีน ีง ีกึีพีธึีด ีฐีกีตีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ, ีธึึีกีีถ ีฏีฟึีซ ีกีตีฝีบีฅีฝ ีฏีธีนีพีกีฎ ีคีกีฟีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีธึ ีซีีถีน ีฝีบีกีฝีฅีฌึ

entry.title: ิฑีดีธึีฝีถีกีฏีกีถ ีพีฅีณีฅึีจ ีฌีธึีฎีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฐีกีทีฟีกึีกึีซีถ ีคีซีดีฅีฌีจ ีบีกึีฟีกีคีซึ ีง ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ

media:group.media:title: ิฑีดีธึีฝีถีกีฏีกีถ ีพีฅีณีฅึีจ ีฌีธึีฎีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฐีกีทีฟีกึีกึีซีถ ีคีซีดีฅีฌีจ ีบีกึีฟีกีคีซึ ีง ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ
media:group.media:description:
ิธีฝีฟ ีพีซีณีกีฏีกีฃึีธึีฉีตีกีถี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีฟีกึีฅีฏีกีถ ีดีธีฟ 3,000 ีกีดีธึีฝีถีกีฏีกีถ, ีจีถีฟีกีถีฅีฏีกีถ ีพีฅีณ ีง ึีถีถีพีธึีด ีคีกีฟีกึีกีถีธึีดึ ิฑีตีฝ ีฎีกีถึีกีขีฅีผีถีพีกีฎีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฉีฅีฉึีกึีถีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฏีซึีกีผีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีฅีป ีง ีคึีพีฅีฌ ีฐีกีทีฟีกึีกึีซ ีซีถีฝีฟีซีฟีธึีฟีจี ีีกีทีฟีกึีกึีถีฅึีซ ีซีถึีถีกีฏีกึีฃีกีพีธึีพีธีฒ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจึ ิฑีตีถ ีกีถีฏีกีญ, ีซีถึีถีกีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีพีธีฒ ีธีน ีกีผึีฟึีกีตีซีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีง: ิฑีดีธึีฝีถีกีฌีธึีฎีธึีฉีตีกีถ, ีกีฌีซีดีฅีถีฟีซ, ีฅึีฅีญีกีตีซ ีญีถีกีดึีซ ีพีฅีณีฅึีซ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด ีดีซีถีนึ ีคีกีฟีกึีกีถ ีคีซีดีฅีฌีจ ีกีตีฌึีฝ ีบีกึีฟีกีคีซึ ีฏีฌีซีถีซ ีฐีกีทีฟีกึีกึีซีถ ีคีซีดีฅีฌีจ:
ิปีีถีน ีง ีฐีกีทีฟีกึีกึีซ ีซีถีฝีฟีซีฟีธึีฟีจ, ีธึีธีีถึ ีฅีถ ีฐีกีทีฟีกึีกึีซีถ ีคีซีดีฅีฌีธึ ีกีผีกีพีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ึ ีซีีถีน ีจีถีฉีกึีกีฏีกึีฃ ีง ีกีตีถ ีฅีถีฉีกีคึีธึีดึ ิฑีตีฝ ึ ีกีตีฌ ีฐีกึึีฅึีซ ีง ีบีกีฟีกีฝีญีกีถีธึีด ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีีกีทีฟีกึีกึีถีฅึีซ ีซีถึีถีกีฏีกึีฃีกีพีธึีพีธีฒ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึ ิณีกีตีกีถีฅ ิดีฅีดีซึีนีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิบีกีถีถีก ิฑีพีกีฃีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีดึ

entry.title: Armenia, US sign strategic cooperation agreement

media:group.media:title: Armenia, US sign strategic cooperation agreement
media:group.media:description:
๐ In a ceremony held at the U.S. State Department in Washington, Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan and Secretary of State Antony Blinken signed the Strategic Partnership Charter, marking what they called a significant milestone in bilateral relations. ๐ Armenia summoned Russia's ambassador to Yerevan today to lodge a formal protest over statements made on Russia's state television that threatened Armenia's sovereignty. ๐ The European Union's Commissioner for Enlargement Marta Kos announced today at the European Parliament's Foreign Affairs Committee in Brussels that the EU will thoroughly examine Armenia's potential membership application. ๐ An Unflattering Charter. media:group.media:title: Unpacking the US-Armenia strategic partnership
media:group.media:description:
During the last days of the Biden administration, the United States has signed a strategic partnership agreement with Armenia. We are joined by Benyamin Poghosyan, senior research fellow at the Yerevan-based APRI Armenia think tank, to discuss what the agreement means for the countriesโ deepening relationship. In addition, Poghosyan looks ahead to the incoming Trump administrationโs foreign policy and how it could affect the South Caucasus region.
0:00 Introduction 0:32 Whatโs the significance of a strategic partnership? 1:32 Security guarantees for Armenia? 3:17 Civilian nuclear energy cooperation 5:27 Diversification of energy supplies away from Russia 6:20 Export controls and border security capacity building 8:25 Future of Russian border guards in Armenia 10:19 Why the agreement now in the Biden administrationโs last days? 13:17 Predicting the Trump administrationโs South Caucasus policy

ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ึ ีีซีกึีตีกีฌ ีีกีฐีกีถีฃีถีฅึีจ ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีฅึีซีถ ยซีีกีฆีดีกีพีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีฏีกีถีธีถีกีคึีธึีฉีตีธึีถยป ีฏีธีนีพีธีฒ ึีกีฝีฟีกีฉีธึีฒีฉีจึ ีีกีทีซีถีฃีฟีธีถีธึีดี ิฑีี ีบีฅีฟึีกึีฟีธึีฒีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีธึีด ีฏีกีตีกึีกีฎ ีกึีกึีธีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ ึีกีฝีฟีกีฉีฒีฉีซ ีฟีกีฏ ีซึีฅีถึ ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีคึีฅึีซีถ ิฑีี ีบีฅีฟึีกึีฟีธึีฒีกึ ิทีถีฉีธีถีซ ิฒีฌีซีถึีฅีถีจ ึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีกึีฟีฃีธึีฎีถีกีญีกึีกึ ิฑึีกึีกีฟ ีีซึีฆีธีตีกีถีจึ
In a ceremony held at the U.S. State Department in Washington, Secretary of State Antony Blinken and Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan signed the โStrategic Partnership Charter,โ marking a significant milestone in bilateral relations.
The comprehensive partnership, as outlined by Secretary Blinken, rests on four main pillars: economic cooperation, security and defense collaboration, democratic development, and people-to-people exchanges. A key economic highlight is the upcoming negotiations for a โ123 Agreement,โ establishing a legal framework for peaceful nuclear cooperation, including transferring nuclear materials, equipment, and technology under strict security protocols.
On security matters, Blinken announced that a U.S. Customs and Border Patrol team would visit Armenia next month to support capacity-building efforts. The partnership builds on existing military cooperation, including the annual โEagle Partnerโ bilateral exercises.
As part of the agreement, Armenia will join the Global Coalition to Defeat ISIS, becoming the 88th member of this international security alliance.
โThe Armenian government demonstrates a real commitment to building a more just society. I particularly want to note the work of Prime Minister Pashinyan and his government in implementing reforms in critical areas, especially in justice and law enforcement. Last month at the State Department, we had the honor of presenting one of our anti-corruption leadership awards for exceptional work in fighting corruption,โ Blinken stated.
Blinken emphasized that this strategic partnership โwill contribute to forming a more resilient, peaceful, and independent South Caucasus. We are becoming increasingly strong partners, and I believe this serves the interests of both our countries, as well as the region and beyond.โ
Foreign Minister Mirzoyan highlighted the significance of the charter: โThe Armenia-U.S. Strategic Partnership Charter we are signing today provides a robust framework and brings greater ambition to our cooperation.โ
โOur relations, based on shared values and mutual interests, have shown remarkable growth in recent years, maturing to a point where upgrading them to a strategic partnership is not only fitting but essential for navigating the complex geopolitical landscape,โ Mirzoyan noted. โWe deeply appreciate the United Statesโ unwavering support for Armeniaโs independence, sovereignty, and territorial integrity.โ
Mirzoyan concluded by expressing Armeniaโs commitment to the peace agenda and its implementation, emphasizing that the charter would serve as both a testament to deepening strategic relations and a roadmap for a future of shared achievements between the two nations. #CivilNet #ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ
